tns:patch.author: Mauricio Bertoli
tns:patch.description: Change the type field for those measures that should only be available on Donor Reports

script.lang: UPDATE amp_measures SET type = 'D' WHERE measurename IN ('Actual Estimated Disbursements','Planned Estimated Disbursements','pipeline Estimated Disbursements','Actual Release of Funds','Planned Release of Funds','pipeline Release of Funds');
